item.title: Working On Scripts
item.description: Working on scripts with logical opcodes Building on Bitcoin 2018 https://twitter.com/kanzure/status/1014167120417091584 Bitcoin has logical opcodes in bitcoin script. Depending on whose is trying to spend coins or what information they have, they interact with logical opcodes. We could see a simple example here taken from one of the lightning network commitment transcraction scripts. It pushes a key on to the stack so that a checksig can run later. It adds a relative timelock as well.
